pullRequest.title: Change K8s liveness/readiness probe to TCP

nodes.bodyText:
We cannot use RPC port as the indicator for HA (embedded journal), because only the leader's port will accept connections. All followers will refuse connection on both RPC and web port, so the probes won't work.
In alluxio-monitor.sh master, it uses MasterHealthCheckClient 
  
    
      alluxio/shell/src/main/java/alluxio/master/MasterHealthCheckClient.java
    
    
         Line 205
      in
      164cf86
    
    
    
    

        
          
           String cmd = String.format("ssh %s %s %s", ShellUtils.COMMON_SSH_OPTS, host, 
        
    
  

.
The logic there is to SSH and look for the master/job-master process on each node. If the processes are all there, check if the primary's RPC port is ready. This cannot be done easily in the probe.
